job.title: Infrastructure Regulations Support Project Manager
job.description: PARENTAL COVER Founded in 1999 and premium listed on the Main Market of the London Stock Exchange, Playtech is a technology leader in the gambling industry with over 7,000 employees across 20 countries. Playtech is the gambling industry's leading technology company delivering business intelligence-driven gambling software, services, content, and platform technology across the industry's most popular product verticals, including, casino, live casino, sports betting, virtual sports, bingo and poker. Read more about who we are and what we do here: www.playtech.com & www.playtechpeople.com Here at Playtech, we genuinely believe that people are our biggest asset. Diverse thoughts, experiences, and individual characteristics enrich our work environment and lead to better business decisions. Recognizing differences and ensuring our processes are transparent is the core of Playtech's overall commitment to responsible business practices. Ready to level up your career? Playtech's INFRASTRUCTURE UNIT is looking for a proactive Regulations Support Project Manager with great communication skills. Press play and let us design future technology together! Job Description Your influential mission. You will... Lead and coordinate regulatory projects and requests in the Infrastructure Business Unit Interpret audit controls to understand what is requested, gather the needed evidence from technical teams & defend it in audit session calls Be the representative contact point for all internal & external technical audits (both written and verbal) for the Playtech Infrastructure Create and maintain an information knowledge base in the Infrastructure unit to support the business Communicate inside the Infrastructure unit, the Compliance, Security, and product delivery teams of Playtech to ensure a smooth information flow Participate in the creation of infrastructure-related documentation and policies Qualifications Components for success. You... Have a proactive approach to your responsibilities and a willingness to take ownership of your domain Have strong analytical capabilities and attention to detail Are confident and excellent communicator, both in verbal conversations and in writing Keep cool under pressure and stressful situations Are a true team player at heart and skilled in building relationships You'll get extra points for... Having previous experience with standards and regulatory audits Having previous working experience in IT Having previous experience in working with legal documentation and regulations Thrive in a culture that values... Initiative-taking and confident approach at the workplace Global scope and inclusive working environment Constant learning and development opportunities Active lifestyle and mental well-being Fun and engaging company events Additional Information REGULATIONS SUPPORT PROJECT MANAGERS TEAM The team is a part of Playtech's Infrastructure unit that provides private cloud platform services to all Playtech Products. Our small, tight-knit team keenly monitors our business unit's compliance with all regulations' requirements and our high standards of responsible gambling. We use our analytical skills to understand audit controls, communication skills to gather and present the needed evidence, and our trait for attention to detail to map it all to our knowledge base. Playtech is an equal opportunities employer. Our mission is to welcome everyone and create inclusive teams. We celebrate differences and encourage everyone to join us and be themselves at work.
